name: Disasteroids (itch) (RvengefuLobster)
description:
"Disasteroids" is an Asteroids clone I made to get familiar with Unity. I attempted to replicate most core features from the original with one major addition: The player can now fire missiles by clicking on the screen!

The code base can be found here: https://github.com/SamDBrian/Disasteroids

All sprites were made from scratch by me. Some bare more similarity to the originals sprites than others.

Font is Hyperspace by Pixel Saga.

Sound effects by mattflat, whose work can be found at: https://mattflat.itch.io/.
